name: Do or Donut
description:
"Your favorite sugary treat is on the line. Will you risk it all? OR DIE TRYING?"

This game was created using the Ink narrative scripting program for consideration in the annual Ink Game Jam, 2020. I learned the program this weekend in preparation for the game jam, so this is a rough prototype more than a proper full submission. 

If you'd like to learn more, contact me, or view my other games and music work, you can do so at devinpolaski.com.
